data.comment: Today's referee, Jerome Miguelgorry, has blown to start the match.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Metz.
In the minute 2, In Metz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Jerome Miguelgorry awards the away team a throw-in.
Lorient's Pierre-Yves Hamel gets in a shot on goal at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
In the minute 6, Metz have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Ibrahima Niane (Metz) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Lorient.
Free kick for Metz in the half of Lorient.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards Lorient a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in high up the field for Lorient in Metz.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
In Metz Lorient attack through Pierre-Yves Hamel. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Throw-in for Metz in the half of Lorient.
Throw-in for Lorient at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 18, Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the home team in Metz.
Metz pushes forward through Fabien Centtonze, whose finish on goal is saved.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a Metz throw-in in Lorient's half.
In Metz, Lorient push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In Metz, Vincent Pajot (Metz) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Free kick Metz.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
In the minute 32, Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Metz's Opa Nguette misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 34, Jerome Miguelgorry awards Lorient a goal kick.
Can Lorient capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Pierre-Yves Hamel heads in to make it 0-1 at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 37, Metz to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Metz close to the penalty box.
Ibrahima Niane for Metz drives towards goal at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 39, Metz have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Victorien Angban (Metz) has received a yellow card from Jerome Miguelgorry.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Metz.
Metz's Matthieu Udol breaks free at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
In the minute 42, An attacking Metz player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! The home team are now level through a Ibrahima Niane penalty.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Metz are coming forward and Ibrahima Niane gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Throw-in Lorient.
In the minute 45, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a Metz throw-in in Lorient's half.
The first-half is over at Stade Saint Symphorien.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Metz in their own half.
Metz have a goal kick.
In Metz Lorient drive forward through Fabien Lemoine. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 48, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Can Lorient get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Metz.
In the minute 50, Opa Nguette for Metz gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 52, Laurent Abergel for Lorient has been booked by Jerome Miguelgorry and receives a first yellow card.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards Lorient a goal kick.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Metz to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
In the minute 57, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Opa Nguette gets his shot on target but fails to score for Metz.
Ibrahima Niane is on target to give Metz a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 59, Habib Maiga instrumental with a fine assist.
Lorient have a goal kick.
Jerome Miguelgorry awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a Lorient throw-in in Metz's half.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a throw-in for Lorient, close to Metz's area.
Lorient have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 64, Ibrahima Niane heads in to give Metz a 3-1 lead at Stade Saint Symphorien.
That's a fine assist from Victorien Angban.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
The home team have replaced Thierry Ambrose with Pape Ndiaga Yade. This is the first substitution made today by Vincent Hognon.
Throw-in for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Free kick for Metz in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 69, Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Lorient.
Vincent Le Goff of Lorient smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Christophe Pelissier (Lorient) is making a first substitution, with Enzo Le Fee replacing Fabien Lemoine.
Lorient make their second substitution with Adrian Grbic replacing Thomas Fontaine.
In the minute 70, Stephane Diarra is replacing Pierre-Yves Hamel for Lorient at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Jerome Miguelgorry.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the home team in Metz.
Habib Maiga for Metz drives towards goal at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Fabien Centtonze of Metz gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Corner awarded to Metz.
In the minute 76, Throw-in Lorient.
Throw-in for Metz in the half of Lorient.
Can Metz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lorient's half?
In the minute 77, Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lorient drives forward and Stephane Diarra gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Stephane Diarra (Lorient) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
The away team replace Thomas Monconduit with Sylvain Marveaux.
Metz are pushing forward but Pape Ndiaga Yade's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 82, Lorient have a goal kick.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lorient needs to be cautious. Metz have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 84, Vincent Hognon is making the team's second substitution at Stade Saint Symphorien with Warren Tchimbembe replacing Opa Nguette.
Jerome Miguelgorry signals a free kick to Metz just outside Lorient's area.
In the minute 85, Jerome Miguelgorry awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Lorient.
Lorient's Yoane Wissa has been booked in Metz.
In the minute 89, In Metz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Metz.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Lorient's Sylvain Marveaux gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Throw-in for Lorient at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
That's full-time at Stade Saint Symphorien. The final score is 3-1.
Umut Bozok is on a sub for Yoane Wissa for Lorient.
Vincent Hognon is making the team's third substitution at Stade Saint Symphorien with Youssef Maziz replacing Vincent Pajot.
